Description__c: To store any information about clients specific to their personal finances and how they prefer to manage their money
Name: Personal Finances

Description__c: This category is used to capture facts relevant to how we manage compliance.
Name: Compliance

Description__c: Capture any customer vulnerability within this fact category to ensure we provide our service with customers' interests at the forefront.
Name: Vulnerability

Description__c: Any conflicts of interest are captured with facts in this category.
Name: Conflict of interest

Description__c: Capture the things customers should or should not be invested in, such as a leaning towards sustainable investments or employer trading restrictions. Helps planners to make appropriate recommendations and partners to deliver investment slides to clients.
Name: Investment preferences

Description__c: Capture lifeline assumptions where we want to override what we do as standard when building lifelines for a customer.
Name: Lifeline Assumptions

Description__c: Capture events in your customers' lives and let the planning team know if they should be modelled and/or displayed on the timeline. This can be used to capture specific goals for the future like a career change or buying a house.
Name: Events

Description__c: The things our customers are hoping to achieve as a result of the advice we provide them.
Name: Objectives

Description__c: Use the facts in lifestyle to capture things that help you manage the client relationship.
Name: Lifestyle

Description__c: Anything related to how we contact the customer should be captured within here.
Name: Contact Preferences

Description__c: Captures a persons personal relationship with money to gain a deeper understanding of their values and motivations behind their finances.
Name: Money & Values

Description__c: To track distribution key points like referrals, reviews etc.
Name: Business development

Description__c: To store any retirement planning information about the client
Name: Retirement

Description__c: Used on advice. A clients priorities when receiving advice.
Name: Advice priorities
